message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 is a tempting offer, the value this product brings is truly significant.  Could you consider meeting me halfway at $13,000?
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,500?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I need a price that reflects the true worth of this product.  How about we split the difference again and settle on $12,250?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go any lower than $11,750. This is my final offer, as I have another interested buyer.
I appreciate your time, Alice, but I'm still at $11,000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet here.
